properties.entry: INSERT INTO MESSAGE(MESSAGE_NO, SENDER, RECEIVER, CONTENT ) VALUES (SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT NICK_NAME ,USER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO IN ( SELECT RECEIVER AS MESSAGE_USER FROM MESSAGE WHERE SENDER = ? UNION SELECT SENDER AS MESSAGE_USER FROM MESSAGE WHERE RECEIVER = ?)
SELECT * FROM MESSAGE WHERE SENDER IN(?,?) AND RECEIVER IN(?,?) ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO MESSAGE(MESSAGE_NO, SENDER, RECEIVER, CONTENT ) VALUES (SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, ?, (SELECT USER_NO FROM MEMBER JOIN BOARD ON (WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?), ? )
SELECT * FROM MESSAGE WHERE RECEIVER = ? AND IS_READ = 'N'
UPDATE MESSAGE SET IS_READ = 'Y' WHERE SENDER = ? AND RECEIVER = ?
SELECT CONTENT FROM MESSAGE RECEIVER = ? AND IS_READ = 'N'
